name: Aqua Cutter
description: You expel pressurized water to cut the target like a blade. Make a melee attack, dealing 1d12 + MOVE water damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical hit on natural attack rolls of 19 or 20.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
